ai-atk-s0404a30:1_0: After doing it first to the second point, they all make a miracle.
ai-atk-s0404a30:2_0: Discussion of the proper conduct for the upper garments
ai-atk-s0404a30:3_0: The Book of the Tens is finished.
ai-atk-s0404a30:4_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-atk-s0404a30:5_0: if it is the upper limb.
